channel.title: CVE Feed for ninjateam -- GDPR CCPA Compliance Support
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ninjateam -- GDPR CCPA Compliance Support

item.title: CVE-2020-36718|2024-08-04T17:37:07.510Z -- ninjateam -- gdpr%20ccpa%20compliance%20support
item.description: The GDPR CCPA Compliance Support plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to PHP Object Injection in versions up to, and including, 2.3 via deserialization of untrusted input "njt_gdpr_allow_permissions" value. This allows unauthenticated attackers to inject a PHP Object.
